ruleContent.content:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
let cid = java.hexDecodeToString(result);
java.get(source.bookSourceUrl+'/content?item_id='+cid+'&key='+Map('密钥'),{"Content-Type": "application/json","Accept":"application/json, text/plain, */*"}).body()
</js>
$.data.content

ruleSearch.author: author
ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
let res = JSON.parse(result)
let books

if (res.search_tabs) {
  res.search_tabs.forEach((i) => {
    if (i.tab_type == 3) books = i.data
  })
} else books = res.data

let results = []

books.forEach(w=> {
        if (w.book_data[0].genre =="0") {
            results.push(w.book_data[0])
        }
    })

JSON.stringify(results)
</js>$[*]
ruleSearch.name: book_name
